block.p: An end-of-summer Texas barbecue with country music will be held on Sept. 10 at 3 p.m. at the Maidstone Arms, 207 Main Street, East Hampton, N.Y. The fee is $48 for adults, $24 for children under 12, plus tax and tip: (631) 324-5006.

An end-of-summer Texas barbecue with country music will be held on Sept. 10 at 3 p.m. at the Maidstone Arms, 207 Main Street, East Hampton, N.Y. The fee is $48 for adults, $24 for children under 12, plus tax and tip: (631) 324-5006.

A dinner recreating the funeral feast for King Midas will be held on Sept. 23 at 6 p.m. at the University of Pennsylvania Museum, 33rd and Spruce Streets, Philadelphia. The menu will feature spicy lamb and lentils, which university archeologists determined were served, based on their analysis of vessels in the king's tomb in central Turkey.
The fee for the dinner is $135 for museum members, $150 for non-members: (215) 898-4890. An exhibition on the king opens Sept. 26 and runs through December.
